> Hydras:
>
> Hydras cursed and openeing fire agaisnt the alien said "Pick up Cyclonus
> too, open fire against every creep that you find and slowly retreat to the
> tunnels..."

As Hydras opens fire on the insect like creature his blasts rip into
the creature severely damaging it, that combined with the other damage
that it has already recived forces it to stumble back several steps,
smoke begining to come from several cracks that have opened in his
armor.

Curiously it smiled as it turned around to look at Hydras, its mouth
dripping some sort of lubricant from the side as it did so, "You are
different, more powerful. Like this last one. You will become one with
the horde like he will." the creature said, its voice much rougher
than it had been before, obviously from the damage it had just taken.
"Your techological advantages and distinctiveness will be added to our
own and wel will be stronger." It turned its cannon on Hydras it it
prepared to fire. However instead of firing on Hydras his chest
erupted in flames and smoke and it fell over!

Behind the creature stood Cyclonus, his cannon in hand, it is obvious
that he had fired the felling blow, and also obvious that he had not
been unconscious only dazed, and Hydras' attack had allowed him to
fire on him as well.

"Sir." Cyclonus said as he stepped foward, his legs a bit shaky,
obviously he was also heavily damaged. "We have recovered Scourge, but
his two drones were taken before I got here." Cyclonus glanced at the
fallen creature. "We will need to get Scourge some medical attention."

Iguanus and Inferno had already stepped foward to pick up the fallen
forms of Scourge and Bruticus-X.

Fractyl, who should have been recovering Insecticon was instead
looking at the fallen creature, his optics curious, he was reaching
foward to examine it . . .

(TAG)

Preston
